attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app took 9 months to load, during the time of loading it caused my phone to glitch and over heat. my phone then caught on fire and exploded. I went to apple to get a new phone and switched my iCloud onto this new phone to get my apps back. The app re downloaded and deleted all the pictures off my phone. I went to iCloud to try to get my pictures back and all there was were pictures of Donald Trump. Please do not get this app!
